Package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control

This package contains classes pertaining the control flow used in both the server and the app.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionWatch.TimeoutListener
    Callback interface for timeouts
    OnCommandListener
    Implement this to be able to be notified of commands
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandConnection
    This class is able to both send and receive commands.
    ConnectionWatch
    This class handles checking the connection age.

Package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control Description

This package contains classes pertaining the control flow used in both the server and the app.
